short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pay as you go service based on AI to enhance the email's body to be more inclusive.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
UniTAUWS-WIDGET
Transforming language for a better world with UniTAUWS.

Let UniTAUWS help you communicate with empathy and respect.

UniTAUWS is a revolutionary widget designed to promote inclusive language and foster a more welcoming environment for everyone.
The widget integrates seamlessly with your email and online word processor (G-docs), automatically editing and replacing exclusive
language with inclusive text.

At UniTAUWS, we understand the power of language and how it can either include or exclude people. Our widget is designed to help
individuals and organizations communicate in a way that is more inclusive and respectful of everyone's identity, background, and
experiences.

Using UniTAUWS is a simple and effective way to make your communication more inclusive. Whether you're writing an email, a document, or a blog post, our widget will suggest alternative language that is more inclusive and avoids harmful stereotypes or
assumptions.

UniTAUWS is designed to promote social justice and empower individuals and organizations to create a more inclusive society. We believe that everyone deserves to feel seen, heard, and respected, and that starts with the language we use.

Join the UniTAUWS community today and become part of a movement towards a more inclusive world. Our widget is easy to install and use, and it can help you and your organization make a meaningful impact.


Together and united we stand, and with UniTAUWS, we can create a more inclusive future for everyone.
